description: System-generated primary key for the work type record.
Business code used to identify the work type in work orders and schedules.
Human-readable description of the work type.
Free-text notes about the work type’s usage, constraints, or legacy details.
Flag indicating this work type is the default selection; likely 1 = default, 0 = not. Confirm with SME.
Default urgency/priority used when creating work orders of this type; values likely map to scheduling rules. Confirm with SME.
System timestamp when the work type record was last changed.
Flag to send mobile/PDA notification when this work type is used; likely 1 = enabled, 0 = disabled. Confirm with SME.
Timestamp recorded by the user-facing application when a user last modified this work type; may differ from system last_modified. Confirm semantics with SME.
Email address to notify the assignee role for work orders of this type (if configured).
Notification status/preference for the assignee email (e.g., active, disabled). Exact codes likely system-specific; confirm with SME.
Email address of the assigner/requester role to notify for this work type (if configured).
Notification status/preference for the assigner/requester email; codes likely system-specific. Confirm with SME.
Supervisor email to notify for this work type’s activities.
Notification status/preference for the supervisor email; codes likely system-specific. Confirm with SME.
Email for the planning/estimation contact (WOAP estimated resources) to notify for this work type. Likely a configuration field; confirm with SME.
Notification status/preference for the WOAP estimated resources contact; codes likely system-specific. Confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who created this work type record.
Timestamp when this work type record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified this work type record.
Timestamp when a user last modified this work type record.
